document.full_text: its brilliant green rice paddies, thatched-roof huts and overgrown jungle resemble most rural villages in northeast thailand. but the red sign looming over a quiet dusty road in the community of nong hu ling is something different.
document.title: special report: defiance in thailand's "red shirt villages"
lines_and_colors: its brilliant green rice paddies, thatched-roof huts and overgrown jungle resemble most rural villages in northeast thailand. but the red sign looming over a quiet dusty road in the community of nong hu ling is something different.
